about_the_game:
Take on the role of the spoilt sole heir to a once powerful industrial family and, after the death of your grandfather, take over the fortunes of a weapons manufacturer whose history lies hidden in the trials and tribulations of the 1940s. The great prosperity has long since been lost and only crumbs of past wealth still exist.

So you have practically nothing left of your grandfather Wilhelm Werner Werner except the ownership of "Werner Waffenwerke", a few million dollars, a small branch of the once mighty company in a small European country and his much-loved mascot "Werner Wombat". Your task is extremely difficult: lead the company back to its place in the sun.

A variety of challenges await you:
*Design your own weapons and research new technologies
*Build new factories and research facilities
*Sell your weapons in various ways to numerous interested parties
*Manage the company through the many aspects of day-to-day operations
*Become the most valuable company in the world and become the richest person of all time

The project is being developed by me as the sole developer and I am therefore very happy to receive feedback and ideas. At one point or another I may already be a bit blinded by my work and will be grateful for your comments.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
